greetingMessage.upbeat: How about we talk thisss out?
greetingMessage.irritable: Ssstop! Ssstop already! What will make you go away?

idleTimeoutMessage.upbeat: Too ssscared to talk? Let'sss have sssome fun.
idleTimeoutMessage.gloomy: Ssso you won't even talk to me anymore, very well.

initialItemOfferMessage.upbeat: I just ssso happen to have thisss %ITEM% ssspare.
initialItemOfferMessage.irritable: Take thisss %ITEM% and go would you?
initialItemOfferMessage.gloomy: Thisss %ITEM% is probably the best thing I have...

furtherItemOfferMessage.upbeat: Alright, let'sss upgrade that to thisss %ITEM%.
furtherItemOfferMessage.irritable: Don't be ssso cocky. Take this %ITEM%.

furtherItemOfferMessageVariant.upbeat: More? Here'sss a ssspecial just for you then, thisss %ITEM%.
furtherItemOfferMessageVariant.timid: I'm not sssure how much more I have, isss this %ITEM% enough?
furtherItemOfferMessageVariant.gloomy: Sssucks to be me... isss this %ITEM% enough?

acceptedItemOfferMessage.gloomy: Enjoy. It'sss worth more than me anyway...

refuseItemDemandMessage.timid: Sssorry, I can't offer any more.
refuseItemDemandMessage.gloomy: My life'sss not worth any more. Take it inssstead.

initialMoneyOfferMessage.upbeat: Here'sss an explosssive offer for you then, how'sss %MONEY%?
initialMoneyOfferMessage.irritable: I have to pay you to go away? Fine. Here'sss %MONEY%.

furtherMoneyOfferMessage.upbeat: Ssso I'm not going away that easy? Alright, here'sss %MONEY%.
furtherMoneyOfferMessage.irritable: ...Oh? Isss that ssstill not enough? You're insufferable. Take thisss %MONEY%.

furtherMoneyOfferMessageVariant.timid: I'll be in sssoo much trouble giving you %MONEY%...
furtherMoneyOfferMessageVariant.gloomy: More casssh down the drain... Take %MONEY%.

acceptedMoneyOfferMessage.irritable: That'sss cheap to get rid of you.
acceptedMoneyOfferMessage.gloomy: Back to sssquare one I go...

refuseMoneyDemandMessage.upbeat: Let'sss see how much your life isss worth.
refuseMoneyDemandMessage.timid: Sssorry, I can't let you have any more.
refuseMoneyDemandMessage.irritable: I tire of your greed. Let'sss finish this.
refuseMoneyDemandMessage.gloomy: Thisss is all I've got in life. Maybe I'll sssell you.

powerSuccessMessage.upbeat: I had fun. Here, enjoy thisss %POWER% power.
powerSuccessMessage.timid: Thanksss for the chat. Here, take thisss power of %POWER%.
powerSuccessMessage.irritable: Well, that'sss my time. Thanksss. Take thisss %POWER% power.
powerSuccessMessage.gloomy: Hey, it wasssn't bad to chat. Thanksss. Take thisss power of %POWER%.

powerTrees.text: Destruction is what you ssseek? I thought humans were creatorsss?

responses.text: Figured I'd give it a go.

successResponses.irritable: Predictable responsssse, but I like it.

failureResponses.upbeat: Ha. Sssee if you can top thisss.
failureResponses.timid: Sssorry, I can't let you play around with it.
failureResponses.gloomy: Sssigh. I can't let you play with thisss.

responses.text: I need to prepare land for building.

successResponses.upbeat: I could alwaysss do that for you, you know.
successResponses.timid: Don't make too much noissse with that.
successResponses.irritable: You humansss are never sssatisfied with nature. Curiousss.
successResponses.gloomy: More of thisss world you humans are taking, then.

failureResponses.upbeat: Sssnore. You're boring. Let'sss have sssome real fun.
failureResponses.timid: S- Ssstop! I like thisss place how it isss.
failureResponses.irritable: I've had enough of you humansss wrecking thisss world.
failureResponses.gloomy: More conssstruction? I'm rather sssick of it I'm afraid.

successResponses.upbeat: Sssorta look like one to me.
successResponses.timid: So you're sssome sort of sssuper human then? Hmm.
successResponses.irritable: I heard all humansss think that. Interesssting.
successResponses.gloomy: I'm no ssstandard Creeper, too. We're both outcastsss.

failureResponses.upbeat: Get off your high horssse.
failureResponses.timid: Are humansss... evolving? I've had enough change.
failureResponses.irritable: Ssso they all sssay. You're nothing ssspecial.
failureResponses.gloomy: Ssso what? Thisss is too much effort...

children.text: Ssso, conversssely, have you ever heard of a Creeper that buildsss?

successResponses.gloomy: Sssometimes I think I might be able to...

failureResponses.upbeat: I'll ssstick to blowing up. You.
failureResponses.timid: Wha- really? You're jussst teasssing me, aren't you? Fine.
failureResponses.gloomy: Dreamsss for sssome. But not for me.

successResponses.timid: Sssuppose, no need to ssshout it about though.
successResponses.irritable: Ssstill could do better than humansss.
successResponses.gloomy: Yeah, maybe it'sss a sssilly dream...

failureResponses.upbeat: Doesssn't ssstop me from doing thisss!
failureResponses.timid: Ssso that'sss what it takes? I'll ssstick to what I can do then...
failureResponses.gloomy: Ssso there'sss nothing to live for. Ssso be it.

successResponses.upbeat: No beating around the busssh, then?
successResponses.gloomy: Ssshame. One can dream I sssuppose.

failureResponses.upbeat: It wasss a joke. I'll give you sssomething ssserious to think about.
failureResponses.gloomy: Could've usssed the uplift, you know?

children.text: At any rate, you ssseek my power due to your human weaknessss?

successResponses.timid: I ssshould sssay the sssame to you!

failureResponses.upbeat: I'll ssshut you up.
failureResponses.timid: I'll sssshut up in the after life.
failureResponses.irritable: We'll sssee who ssshuts up first.
failureResponses.gloomy: Ssso be it.

responses.text: Humans are still stronger than Creepers!

successResponses.upbeat: I'll let you think that. Haha.
successResponses.irritable: Maybe sssome of you can be.
successResponses.gloomy: Maybe jussst me, I'll give you that.

failureResponses.upbeat: Want to put that to the tessst? Let's go.
failureResponses.irritable: Then let'sss sssee where your power gets you.
failureResponses.gloomy: I can ssstill pack sssome trouble. Just watch.

successResponses.upbeat: Ah, too ssscared to admit it. I get it.

failureResponses.upbeat: Not going to ssshare? Very well. Let'sss sssee if you ssshare in the after life.
failureResponses.timid: Then you'll have to excussse mine. I can't take speechesss.
failureResponses.irritable: And I jussst found a reassson to blow you up.
failureResponses.gloomy: And you don't trussst me to keep them sssecret? Very well.

powerTrees.text: My power? Why? You've already hit me hard...

successResponses.gloomy: You don't need to feel sssorry for me.

failureResponses.upbeat: I'll make you sssorry.
failureResponses.gloomy: Don't wassste your sssympathy on me.

responses.text: It sounded like you enjoyed it.

successResponses.gloomy: The pain remindsss me I'm alive.

failureResponses.upbeat: I'll ssshow you sssomething I enjoy.
failureResponses.gloomy: I have no joysss.

responses.text: It's my only use for you.

successResponses.upbeat: At leassst I have a ussse.

failureResponses.upbeat: And I have none for you.
failureResponses.gloomy: I have no ussse.

successResponses.timid: Thanksss. That makesss it a little better.

failureResponses.upbeat: Let me cheer you up.
failureResponses.irritable: Let me bandage up with your sssorrys.
failureResponses.gloomy: I have a sssorry life...

failureResponses.upbeat: My ssspirit's tough. I'll ssshow you.
failureResponses.gloomy: I'm not interesssted.

successResponses.irritable: You mussst have a magic touch.

failureResponses.upbeat: Come here. I'll kissss you.
failureResponses.gloomy: Isss that sssupposed to be a joke?

children.text: Talking it out, I'm ssstarting to feel better.

failureResponses.upbeat: It isss. Now I can beat you.
failureResponses.timid: Thanksss... but I need to protect myssself.
failureResponses.gloomy: Isss that truly have you feel?

failureResponses.upbeat: I think we can.
failureResponses.gloomy: Maybe not... Let'sss battle it to the death.

successResponses.upbeat: I sssee why you need mine inssstead.
successResponses.gloomy: I wisssh I had that power...

failureResponses.upbeat: What a ssstupid power. Here'sss mine!
failureResponses.gloomy: Don't bother wasssting it on me.

powerTrees.text: More humansss after my power? Ugh, why do I always find myssself in thisss sssorry ssstate?

successResponses.irritable: Thanksss, but I don't think ssso.

failureResponses.upbeat: That'sss just not me.
failureResponses.timid: I'm just an ordinary Creeper. I have nothing to offer you.
failureResponses.gloomy: No, I don't think ssso...

successResponses.upbeat: Maybe I am, never could find a good bassse to blow up.
successResponses.irritable: Heh, you sssay it how it isss.

failureResponses.upbeat: That'sss not very nice. I'll have to blow you up twice!
failureResponses.timid: I can't take any more of this...
failureResponses.irritable: You have no right to sssay that.
failureResponses.gloomy: I didn't need to hear that from you.

successResponses.upbeat: Heh, if you believe in all that I'll play along.
successResponses.timid: I've never consssidered I have a fate.
successResponses.irritable: Never cared much for fate, but it'sss certainly not my fault.

failureResponses.upbeat: You sssound ridiculousss.
failureResponses.gloomy: Fate isss for foolsss.

children.text: I wonder, if I were human, would thingsss be different?

successResponses.upbeat: I think I have a clue.

failureResponses.upbeat: It'sss anyone'sss guess.
failureResponses.gloomy: I'll never find out...

successResponses.timid: I sssuppose being a Creeper isssn't ssso bad, really.
successResponses.irritable: That'sss true. No point dwelling on it.

failureResponses.upbeat: They sssaid the sssame thing about a creature that EXPLODESSS!
failureResponses.gloomy: Ssso much for my dreamsss.

successResponses.upbeat: I've ssseen you humansss play with TNT, you know?

failureResponses.upbeat: That'sss not the life for me.
failureResponses.gloomy: I prefer the easssy out.

children.text: Tell me, do you ever find yourself in the sssame sssituation?

successResponses.gloomy: I get that. Yoursss isss probably better than mine. Thanksss for not bragging.

failureResponses.upbeat: Don't you trussst me?
failureResponses.timid: Do you not like me enough to ssshare?
failureResponses.gloomy: Eh, doesssn't matter anyway...

responses.text: I'm too cool to get caught.

successResponses.timid: I wisssh I could be that cool...
successResponses.gloomy: I usssed to think the sssame...

failureResponses.upbeat: But not asss cool asss me.
failureResponses.timid: You ssshouldn't talk to me, then...
failureResponses.gloomy: I can't ssstand your attitude.

successResponses.gloomy: That mussst sssuck. Trussst me, I'd know.

failureResponses.upbeat: Sssucks to be you.
failureResponses.timid: You sssound like you can take it, though...
failureResponses.gloomy: You're worssse than me.
